text: Tontadarya Matha, in the heart of Gadag city, Karnataka, India, is one of the Virakta Mathas. It is of the Lingayat caste. Also known as Sri Jagadguru Tontadarya Sansthana Math, Dambal-Gadag, it has a rich history and tradition. This math is engaged in many educational and literary activities in and around Gadag. ==External links== *JTMath Category:Buildings and structures in Gadag district Category:Hindu monasteries in India
title: Tontadarya Matha
